ticket.title: Generated scaffold for model with same plural as singular gives errors
ticket.original-body:
If you generate a scaffold from a model for which the plural and singular forms are the same (like species), then there are some errors:
in new.html.erb: <% form_for(@MODELNAME) do |f| %> needs to be changed to <% form_for(@MODELNAME, :url=> {:action=>'create'}) do |f| %>
<%= link_to 'Back', MODELNAME_path %> needs to be changed to <%= link_to 'Back', MODELNAME_index_path %>
I haven't dived into the code to work out how to add a test for this and patch, but could do if that is likely to be useful
